definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: After reasoning, one can conclude that these two parallelograms are similar figures.
sentences.chinese: 经过推理，可以得出这两个平行四边形是相似形。

sentences.english: Let's try to understand how big this parallelogram is.
sentences.chinese: 这个平行四边形有多大呢？

sentences.english: If it is small enough,it will look like a parallelogram.
sentences.chinese: 如果它足够小，它可以近似成平行四边形。

sentences.english: Parekkekogram type, pilot valve control system, toggle control.
sentences.chinese: 平行四边形，先导系统，肘节式操纵。

sentences.english: OK, so now what the area of this parallelogram?
sentences.chinese: 那么现在这个平行四边形的面积是多少？

sentences.english: Finally, we prove that theW-surface on the parallelogram have the convexity-preserving.
sentences.chinese: 最后证明了平行四边形域上W曲面具有保凸性。

sentences.english: And, you see, it does look like a parallelogram.
sentences.chinese: 你们也看到了，它的确看起来像一个平行四边形。

sentences.english: What's the area of each parallelogram?
sentences.chinese: 每个平行四边形的面积各是多少？

sentences.english: One can tune the sizes of the cavities in the array by changing the dimensions of the parallelograms .
sentences.chinese: 改变平行四边形的大小，就可以调整阵列凹陷的大小。

sentences.english: Applies a warp transform, defined by a rectangle and a parallelogram, to this.
sentences.chinese: 应用由一个矩形和一个平行四边形定义的扭曲变换。

sentences.english: The apparatus of claim 9, wherein the four-bar-linkage is a parallelogram.
sentences.chinese: 该仪器索赔9日，其中四杆连杆是一个平行四边形。

definition: axis of symmetry/central axis (in Chinese architecture)
